attributes.action: Extend Financial/Visa Sanctions against Russians linked to President Putin to exert pressure to stop military and covert aggression against Ukraine
attributes.additional_details:
Russia's military incursion into Ukrainian territory is continuing with NATO and British Government identified covert operations in Eastern Ukraine.

We want the British Government to quickly extend financial sanctions and visa bans against Russians who are linked both financially and politically to the Russian Government regime of President Putin.

This extended list should include Russians linked to the Russian regime who have residency status and business interests in the UK.
